resources.string:
1.Sensors will be activated in every 10 seconds for 1 second only. [i.e.BATTERY LIFE] 

 2.If same number calls more than 5 times, profile will be changed to NORMAL MODE. [i.e.EMERGENCY]

 3.If LIGHT less than 10 LUX, profile will be changed to VIBRATE MODE. [i.e.NIGHT]

 4.If mobile is in pocket, profile will be changed to VIBRATE MODE. [i.e.POCKET]

 5.If mobile screen is FLIPPED DOWN, profile will be changed to SILENT MODE. [i.e.MEETING]

 MOHAMMAD TANVIR ISLAM
 14-25471-1
